alert.note: Alert for Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 1:50PM MDT until April 04 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Western Magic Valley zone. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 11 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind, snow, and ice roads could create dangerous driving conditions for the morning commute. Please allow for extra time.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
